yaml.title:
Roussel Desmond Nzoyem
[ddrouslab@gmail.com](mailto:ddrouslab@gmail.com)

markdown.markdown:
```{=html}
  1. Home
  2. About
``` My research lies at the intersection of machine learning and physical systems found in engineering, computer graphics, vision, and more. I build the next wave of generative models and simulation technologies, leveraging my deep experience in differentiable programming, in-context learning, and meta-learning to create realistic and immersive virtual worlds. I completed my PhD at the [University of Bristol](https://www.bristol.ac.uk/cdt/interactive-ai/current-students/2021-cohort/nzoyem/) under the supervision of [Dr. Tom Deakin](https://hpc.tomdeakin.com/), [Prof. David Barton](https://cityinthesky.co.uk/about-me/), and [Prof. Simon McIntosh-Smith](http://uob-hpc.github.io/SimonMS/). My thesis was titled [Learning to Learn Sequential Dynamics](https://www.researchgate.net/publication/400581335_Learning_to_Learn_Sequential_Dynamics_Context-Aware_Out-of-Distribution_Adaptation_for_Time_Series_and_Physical_Systems), in which I combined expertise in AI, HPC, and Scientific Computing. I hold a BSc in Mathematics from [Aix-Marseille University](https://www.univ-amu.fr) (2019) and an MSc in Applied Mathematics from [Strasbourg University](https://mathinfo.unistra.fr/formations/master/master-mathematiques-et-applications/) (2021), advised by [Prof. Stéphane Labbé](https://www.ljll.fr/membre/labbe-stephane/). Beyond research, I am committed to equity in STEM education, volunteering for outreach initiatives with [CodeMakers](https://engineering.blogs.bristol.ac.uk/engineering-includes-me-roussel-desmond-nzoyem/), [ExamStar](https://bio.site/examstar), and [St. Theresa](https://www.stteresasfilton.org.uk/first-holy-communion-2025), among others. In my downtime, I enjoy football, playing the piano, creative coding, and building indie games. Feel free to explore my [CV](cv.qmd) or learn more through my profile on [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/roussel-desmond-nzoyem/). And [let’s connect](#contact-me) if you'd like to collaborate or chat!

Education

Sept 2021 - Feb 2026
PhD in Machine Learning (Interactive AI)
University of Bristol Bristol, UK
Sept 2019 - Sept 2021
MSc in Applied Mathematics (CSMI)
University of Strasbourg Strasbourg, FR
Nov 2017 - Jul 2019
BSc in Mathematics
Aix-Marseille University Marseille, FR
Apr 2017 - Jun 2019
Associate degree in Mechatronics
Oshima College of Technology Oshima, JP
Jan 2017 - Apr 2019
Associate degree in Computer Science
University of the People Pasadena, USA

Work Experience

Nov 2025 - Jan 2026
Visiting Researcher
University of Alberta Edmonton, CA
Jan 2022 - Sept 2025
Teaching Assistant
University of Bristol Bristol, UK
Jun 2024 - Sept 2024
Data Science Internship
SLB (Schlumberger) Abingdon, UK
May 2022 - Aug 2022
PhD Summer Projects
HPC Research Group & Bristol Robotics Lab. Bristol, UK
Feb 2021 - Jul 2021
MSc Internship
Laboratoire Jacques-Louis Lions (Sorbonne Université) Paris, FR
Jun 2020 - Aug 2020
MSc Internship
Institut de Recherche Mathématiques Avancées (IRMA) Strasbourg, FR

Hobbies

::: {layout-nrow=2} ![I enjoy all things computer hardware, software and games: from old classics to AAA's like Titanfall. Nothing like a first-person shooter to evade your troubles.](assets/images/titanfall.jpg) ![I'm pretty sure there exists a dimension in which I am a moviemaker or a movie score composer à la Giacchino !](assets/images/batsybats.jpg) ![My old Casiotone CT-S100. I recently got back to making music. Hopefully some of my pieces will feature here soon.](assets/images/piano.jpg) ![Football is life. I play weekly in one of Bristol's minor leagues. Call me if you're putting together a game.](assets/images/football.jpg) :::

Address

Contact me

```{=html} ```
